segment.target: You have built a *{target_equipment}*.
**{character}** found a brand new **{target_equipment}** in a space capsule.
**{character}** sets about reproducing a plant created by the **{target_equipment}**. Congratulations! The young plant is in perfect health.
You have earned {quantity} :pa:.
You have earned {quantity} :pm:.
You have earned {quantity} :hp:.
You have lost {quantity} :hp:.
You have earned {quantity} :pmo:.
You have lost {quantity} :pmo:.
You have lost {quantity} :pa:.
You have lost {quantity} :pm:.
This action completes the personal objectives for your character. You have earned *{quantity} Glory*.
:dead: **{character}** is dead. Cause : {end_cause}.
**{character}** has knocked over the **{target_equipment}**.
You can't breathe... You are choking... But fortunately this *Oxygen Capsule* saved your life...
Disgusting... You're filthy. (Not like that. Although...)
Disgusting... Fortunately you are wearing your **Stainproof Apron**...
That wasn't supposed to happen. In the heat of the action you hurt yourself...
That wasn't supposed to happen. Thanks to your **Protective Gloves**, you avoided the catastrophe...
The room suddenly starts to shake violently. The crewmembers present find themselves thrown to the floor and bits of the ceiling have collapsed here and there. What a wreck...
The room suddenly starts to shake violently. Objects fly across the room and collide with the crew members present.
A brutal electrical spike just shorted out all the equipment in the room, and a massive shock was sent through all the crew present!
You are shaking, you have lost hope, you ask yourself what you're doing here and when this hell will be over... You are the victim of a Panic Attack.
Oh! One of the plants has produced a: **{target_equipment}**.
The garden was ransacked by the attack, of the 12 plants, only 2 remain and an empty pot...
You are hungry. If you don't remedy this situation, your health will deteriorate every cycle.
These idiots just get in your way the whole time, seeing them waste their time on such pointless trifles causes you to fear the worst for the future of humanity...
You have won *8 Triumph* because you are expecting a happy event!
:ill: You don't feel very good, not good at all... Hot... Cold... Hot... Cold... You should see a doctor. You have contracted a physiological disease: {disease}.
You feel better, your {disease} has finally healed...
:psy_disease: You don't feel great... Your head is spinning, you feel confused, stressed, and anxious. You should see a *Shrink*. You have picked up a psychological illness: {disease}.
**{character}** has managed to cure **{target_character}** of their disease ({disease}).
**{character}** has made progress in curing **{target_character}** of their disease, but the treatment must continue.
**{character}** is happy. The **{target_character}** session went well. But more will be required.
:hurt: You have been hurt: {disease}. This will incur penalties.
:ill: With what has just happened to you, your disease {disease} is gone. But it is now the least of your worries.
:pill: **{character}** throws themselves on the floor screaming and calling for their mother...
:pill: **{character}** suddenly starts bashing their head against the wall... looks like it hurts too...
:pill: **{character}** starts running in circles, and nothing seems to stop them... except fatigue...
:ill: **{character}** is vomiting their meal. Not exactly appetizing...
Atchoo!
:pill: **{character}** suddenly turns to **{target_character}** and starts to devour their arm...
:ill: **{character}** scratch their filthy patches, it's really atrocious...
:pill: **{character}** has a little bit of foam escaping from the corner of their mouth... It's pretty disgusting...
:pill: **{character}** is drooling incessantly, this is beginning to seem suspicious...
AAAaaaaaaaRRRrgghhhhhhh....
:cat: The cat was in the room, you couldn't help running away...
Your sleep is restless, impossible to recover properly...

The operation seems to last forever, **{character}** finally gives their verdict with a smile on their face... such a brilliantly performed operation can advance science! The wound ({disease}) of **{target_character}** is healed.
The operation seems to take forever... such a brilliantly performed operation can advance science! The wound ({disease}) of **{character}** is healed.
You feel strange... emotion... or else... Your partner has given you a disease ({disease}).
What you just witnessed shocked you. You will never be the same again.
